name: Early Skunk
description: Cannabis Cup winner Early Skunk is an indica-dominant hybrid cross between Skunk #1 and Early Pearl. This easy-to-grow strain is favored for its short flowering period, resistance to mold, and heavy yields, making it ideal for a novice grower. Expect large harvests of large buds that deliver a long-lasting, smooth, pungently sweet taste and smell.Â
